Once you've caught your breath, you walkalong the river bank and soon reach a crudewooden dock. Two Rakas are guarding theirhunting boat, a long flat-bottomed shell fashionedfrom duster-leaf wood. Nearby is a smaller boat,one you could paddle yourself. You just might beable to untie it, push off, and get across the riverbefore the guards catch you.

If you try to take the small boat and make a break for the other side If you try to bluff the guards into thinking you have permission to use it
